eegunity.module_eeg_correction package¶

Submodules¶

eegunity.module_eeg_correction.eeg_correction module¶

class eegunity.module_eeg_correction.eeg_correction.EEGCorrection(main_instance)[source]¶

Bases: UDatasetSharedAttributes

report()[source]¶

Generate a statistical report on the dataset, including file type proportions, sampling rates, channel configurations, and completeness checks. This report can be generated for individual groups within the dataset or for the dataset as a whole.

visualization_channels_corr(max_sample=16)[source]¶

Visualizes the correlation between EEG data channels for different domains.

Parameters:¶

max_sampleint, optional

Maximum number of samples to visualize per domain. Default is 16.

Returns:¶

None

This function does not return a value. It displays a set of correlation matrix plots for each domain.

visualization_frequency(max_sample=10)[source]¶

Visualize the frequency spectrum for each domain in the dataset.

Parameters:¶

max_sampleint, optional

The maximum number of samples to visualize per domain. If the number of samples in a domain exceeds this value, a random subset will be used. Default is 10.

Returns:¶

None

This function does not return any value. It displays frequency spectrum plots for each domain in the dataset.
